member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId.ComparePublisher
member.summary: Compares the specified publisher with the publisher defined in the manifest.
member.param: The publisher name to be compared.
TRUE if the specified publisher matches the package publisher; FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId.GetArchitecture
member.summary: Gets the processor architecture as defined in the manifest.
member.param: The architecture specified for the package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId.GetName
member.summary: Gets the name of the package as defined in the manifest.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId.GetPackageFamilyName
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId.GetPackageFullName
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId.GetPublisher
member.summary: Gets the name of the package publisher as defined in the manifest.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId.GetResourceId
member.summary: Gets the package resource identifier as defined in the manifest.
member.param: The resource identifier of the package.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId.GetVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the package as defined in the manifest.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId
member.summary: Provides access to the package identity.
